{"id":653165355,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1646390000,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"26 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/653165355/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Champagne Tower","memory":"10.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double champagneTower(int poured, int query_row, int query_glass) {\n        vector<vector<double>> dp(query_row + 1, vector<double> (query_glass + 2, 0));\n        dp[0][0] = poured;\n        \n        for(int i = 0; i < query_row; i++)\n        {\n            for(int j = 0; j <= query_glass; j++)\n            {\n                double leak = max(0.0, (dp[i][j] - 1) / 2);\n                dp[i + 1][j] += leak;\n                dp[i + 1][j + 1] += leak;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        return min(dp[query_row][query_glass], 1.0);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"champagne-tower"}
